name: New Yahoo! Mail Dark
description: A dark theme compatible with *NEW* Yahoo! Mail.  Charcoal background combined with smooth grey text and cool teal and violet highlights makes a theme that is easy on the eyes.
additional_info:
This is based off of stormi's "Global dark style - changes everything to DARK," but I've been playing with this for a while and could be miscrediting and/or leaving out others. [http://userstyles.org/styles/31267/global-dark-style-changes-everything-to-dark]  This also seems to with KemuelDam's "YahooMail (Ajax) - Truly adfree means no adbar."  [http://userstyles.org/styles/23125/yahoomail-ajax-truly-adfree-means-no-adbar]

NOTE: This style causes the text color selection palette in Yahoo! Mail to not display properly, so it's easy to accidentally select a color and not realize it because the script overrides the font color displayed on your screen.  This minor problem is easily avoided by not pressing the color button.  If you really need to change the color of your text, it's best to temporarily turn off this script while you are writing/editing your message.

discussions.name: Unable to uninstall - program not showing in the manage ADD ON extensions list.
